text: Maybe not available for stand up, but the design team and myself will connect with Megan today, defining next steps
Sounds good, thanks Felix. <!channel> Unfortunately I’m home sick today. Please have standup and keep trucking, I’ll be available on slack so hit me up if needed.
<!channel> - Abby's sick today so I'm doing standup at walnut!
Uhghh. Hope you feel better soon !!

Hey <@U0HP6TFNX>, one more question from the design team. Looking specifically at page 10, we’re wondering what the differences are between the solid small red squares and the stripped red squares. Maybe we’re reading too much into it?
Stripes are scheduled activities you missed.
It might not be necessary, it’s something to think about anyway. I don’t know if it’s the right tone to tell people they missed something, or if we only surface the positive actions.

was toying around with that in the scenarios <@U0HP6TFNX> - instead of people marking missed activities as MISSED, i agree that focus should be on marking them as DONE… ones not marked done can be considered MISSED until the user specifies otherwise.
